attributes.action: give the queen a more powerful role in politics by allowing her to publicly express her political feelings on each bill regardless to royal asent as well as the ability to vote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i belive in a country with a monarchy the monarchy should have a large amount of power still a repulicis the opposite. i see our system somwhere in the middle and therefor the queens position is almost becoming pointless. i am a potriot to both this country and its queen so the last thing i would want to see go is the monarchy itself. so instead i suggest more power. diffinaly not complete power but a least some power. i am aware of the queens current power to decline a bill but i feel that she is pressured into signing it with the threat of more restrictions on her power, money or general position.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
